      • getCommonButton

        public javax.swing.JButton getCommonButton(int commonButton)
        Description copied from class: CronosPanel
        This method is intended only for the use of polymorphism. It will allow classes which create an instance of this class to get the Buttons held by this class' subclasses.
        Specified by:
        getCommonButton in class CronosPanel
        Parameters:
        commonButton - An int, represented by class constants, indicating which Button is needed
        Returns:
        The button required as indicated by the argument

      • setCommonButton

        public void setCommonButton(int commonButton,
                            javax.swing.JButton buttonReplacer)
        Description copied from class: CronosPanel
        This method is intended only for the use of polymorphism, hence the reason it does not contain any code. It will allow classes which create an instance of this class to get the Buttons held by this class' subclasses.
        Specified by:
        setCommonButton in class CronosPanel
        Parameters:
        commonButton - An int, represented by class constants, indicating which Button is needed
        buttonReplacer - The button that will replace the button as denoted by the int commonButton
